dialog.name: Rebecca
dialog.text: Hey, so can you connect me to 21 Jeffrey Road?

dialog.name: Rebecca
dialog.text: I know how I left things wasn’t pretty, and that’s on me, well not just that everything was.

dialog.name: Rebecca
dialog.text: I understand if you don’t want to forgive me, nor do I expect you to...

dialog.name: Rebecca
dialog.text: but I’m sorry for everything ive screwed up...

dialog.name: Sarah
dialog.text: STOP. Stop talking. I just can’t deal with this right now.

dialog.name: Sarah
dialog.text: I can’t see you at all. I don’t need this right now, I can't let it affect me.

dialog.name: Sarah
dialog.text: Rebecca, look. If you wanted to be in your niece and nephew’s life, you shouldn't have waited this long.

dialog.name: Rebecca
dialog.text: Sarah please, give me a chance! I will do anyt-

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Hey again. Same as before, 21 Jeffry Road.

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Okay, so I need a line to 14 River View

dialog.name: Oscar
dialog.text: Hi there. Can I get a line on 14 River View? Cheers!
